item.description:
I made a reservation for our group- we will either be at a table upstairs or be in the
private room downstairs but hostess will direct you- if you have any trouble finding us- ask hostess. I will try to be there before 6:15 but in the past have sometimes been 5 or 10 minutes late- so please just hang out and we will have a meeting/ casual discussion! see you soon!

Phone # for Mama Iguanas is: 413-586-0400
The one above is old.

Just general conversation about everything related to technology, science and the interwebs: ie.opportunity to share information, field questions and discuss a variety of topics related to web development, programming, project management, software, visual design, etc. including CSS and others.

Don't be intimidated if you are new to web design, programming etc. we all have different specialized areas of knowledge and want to learn new things....
item.how_to_find_us: ask hostess: private party room downstairs- nice quiet and cheerful place to talk and food there is good now.

group.name: Northampton Web Developers/ Web Designers Meetup Group

item.name: General Meeting: tips and tricks for web developers, web designers & programers
